SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.action

Element SurgicalProcedureAction

Documentation:
Description of a healthcare action, independent of action context.
Ancestors:
  • shr.base.Any
    • shr.base.Content
      • shr.action.Action
        • shr.action.ProcedureAction

  • shr.action.SurgicalProcedureProposedAgainst, 
  • shr.action.SurgicalProcedureRequested

      The technique used to reach the site of the procedure. Approaches may be through the skin or mucous membrane, through an orifice or external.
      		 shr.action.SurgicalApproach
      None
      		 0..* N/A
      Access
      The route used to access the site of a procedure. It is used to distinguish open, closed, and percutaneous procedures.
      		 shr.action.Access
      None
      		 0..* N/A
